speciality.translation[0].definitions[0]: a type of food that a person, restaurant, or area is well known for
The restaurant offers a wide variety of local specialities.
speciality.translation[0].definitions[1]: a subject or job that you know a lot about or have a lot of experience of
speciality.translation[1].definitions[0]: a subject or skill that you know a lot about or have a lot of experience of
My speciality is international tax law.
speciality.translation[2].definitions[0]: speciality products are special or unusual in some way, and are therefore usually expensive
speciality.translation[2].definitions[1]: a shop or restaurant that sells unusual products or food that are special in some way
